task_description: Ames test positivity indicates potential mutagenicity risk
instruction: Given molecule with the provided SMILES and molecular structure image, this is an Ames test positive compound, indicating potential mutagenicity risk. Please modify its structure to reduce its mutagenicity while trying to maintain its original molecular characteristics and function.
focus_points: Electrophilic groups that may form adducts with DNA
Polycyclic aromatic systems, especially planar, conjugated structures
Alkylating agents and other DNA-reactive groups
Potential pro-mutagens that may be metabolically activated in vivo
output_format: Please propose structural modifications that reduce these risks.
